ch0106_11_kamitsure/0101_0701_02_10: Let’s light up Pasio with our endless shine!
ch0106_11_kamitsure/7101_0701_01_10: I didn’t get this sparkle all by myself.
ch0106_11_kamitsure/7101_0701_02_10:
I got it through all the support and
inspiration my fans and challengers
have given me.
ch0106_11_kamitsure/7101_0701_03_10:
By inspiring each other and leveling up,
we make our sparkles shine!
ch0106_11_kamitsure/7102_0701_01_10:
I’m determined to bring out this new sygna
suit’s charm.
ch0106_11_kamitsure/7102_0701_02_10:
As a model and a Gym Leader, I can’t
imagine a greater honor than wearing
this outfit.
ch0106_11_kamitsure/7102_0701_03_10: I must live up to its makers’ expectations!
ch0106_11_kamitsure/7103_0701_01_10: On Pasio, there’s music, art, cooking, sports...
ch0106_11_kamitsure/7103_0701_02_10:
Lots of Trainers create their own style based
on what they love and are good at.
ch0106_11_kamitsure/7103_0701_03_10:
Everyone’s shining with so much energy.
As a model and Gym Leader, I’ve got to stay
on my game, too!
ch0106_11_kamitsure/7104_0701_01_10:
Thundurus always flies through the sky
without anything holding it back.
ch0106_11_kamitsure/7104_0701_02_10: I’d love to express myself freely like that.
ch0106_11_kamitsure/7104_0701_03_10: Then everyone would see a new me!
ch0106_11_kamitsure/7105_0701_01_10: When I think of what makes my heart shine...
ch0106_11_kamitsure/7105_0701_02_10:
battling with my beloved Pokémon comes
to mind.
ch0106_11_kamitsure/7105_0701_03_10:
What about you, [Name:PlayerNickname ]?
What makes you shine?
ch0106_11_kamitsure/1701_0701_01_10:
I’d like to give you something.
Will you accept?
ch0106_11_kamitsure/1701_0702_01_10:
Don’t let anything hold you back!
Show me your sweet success!
ch0106_11_kamitsure/2501_0701_01_10:
I love that phrase Iono always says—
“on the rise like a super-fast Eelektross
crawlin’ outta the ocean!”
ch0106_11_kamitsure/2501_0701_02_10:
If I can come up with something catchy like
that, maybe I’ll be more approachable!
ch0106_11_kamitsure/2501_0702_02_10:
Storm approaching—I’m approachable!
Wildbolt Storm, Elesa Storm!
ch0106_11_kamitsure/2511_0701_01_10:
When I spend time with you, I realize how
important it is to be true to myself.
ch0106_11_kamitsure/2511_0701_02_10:
On days off, I’m usually relaxed, but when
it’s time to shine, I get serious.
ch0106_11_kamitsure/2511_0701_03_10: I feel a different sparkle for both.
ch0106_11_kamitsure/2511_0702_01_10:
I won’t force myself to follow your style,
but I can learn a lot from it.
ch0106_11_kamitsure/2511_0702_02_10:
After all, I like to interact with my fans as
my true self—not all dressed up.
ch0106_11_kamitsure/3001_0701_01_10:
Let’s make today sparkle even more brilliantly
than yesterday!
ch0106_11_kamitsure/3003_0701_01_10:
Each one of you is a hero, basking in the spotlight
of the sun.
ch0106_11_kamitsure/3005_0701_01_10:
The curtain falls, bringing darkness...but it’s times
like this that make us appreciate the light.
